body_html:
Sorry my bad, my memory served me wrong. So here the correct command:
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:default-toolchain

Can you also try:
bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer (without anything else)?

body:
Sorry my bad, my memory served me wrong. So here the correct command:
`bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer --crosstool_top=@bazel_tools//tools/cpp:default-toolchain`

Can you also try:
`bazel build -c opt //tensorflow/cc:tutorials_example_trainer` (without anything else)?
